boardgame.name: Star Trek: Expeditions
boardgame.description: Star Trek: Expeditions is a board game for up to four players, set in the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;New Universe_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; of Star Trek, as seen in the 2009 movie. It is built upon the cooperative board game model and the players will work together against the game itself._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the game, players assume the roles of Kirk, Spock, Bones and Uhura. The premise is the Federation has received a petition for membership from a planet and the Enterprise is dispatched to assess their application. When the Enterprise arrives, they discover:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A Klingon battle cruiser is in orbit;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Civil war is threatening to break out on the planet;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; And the planet is (coincidentally?) reconsidering its application for UFP membership._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Your mission is threefold; defuse the threat of civil war, deal with the Klingon threat and get the planet to join the UFP. And you only have 30 days (roughly equaling 30 turns) in which to do it. or a Klingon battle fleet will warp in and you will be forced to withdraw (thus failing your mission)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each objective is tracked on a scoresheet that monitors your progress. Decisions you make in the game as well as how you interact with the other players will affect the outcome of the mission._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The four figures are fully rendered, 3D versions of the four Bridge officers. The four figures and two spaceships are similar to Heroclix figures, with the clicks on the dials at the base of the figure representing damage and corresponding diminished abilities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This product is designed as a non-collectible, non-blind, all-in-one-and-done game, but is built upon the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;expandable_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; board game model meaning that down the line, new missions and crew members will be made available for folk to play other _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;episodes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

(NOTE: if you buy this from me, you must also buy the expansion from me as well) Played once, pristine condition. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is actual shipping cost for approx. 96oz (incl. box) to your zip code from 30082 plus $3 for box and packaging (I will finalize after you order). International shipping will be actual price plus USD$6.00 (for the box and hassle, sorry, it is much more effort on my end). Contact me if you have any questions about shipping. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees). I have many other games up for sale and in most cases I can combine shipping for some significant savings, but please check with me and provide your zip code for details.

Game components and box etc are like new. PLEASE NOTE: The two ship models are MISSING and are NOT included. I have printed out and mounted counters to keep track of the information needed and the game is completely payable like this (see pictures). It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s actually easier to keep track this way and I have printed out the character stats as well as you can see better how the stats change. (NB I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve been meaning to laminate that character stat sheet and will do before selling!) Postage within the UK £7.95 If paying by paypal please choose the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;family and friend_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; option to avoid fees, otherwise please add 10% of total (£1.80) to cover fees. Thanks for looking. Cheers Ciaran.
